channel.title: Setting font color
channel.description:
Hey everyone,
NOT a GUI question, because I am just printing out to the console, but is there a way to set my font color based upon what type of file it is? All i want is the line or whatever is needed to set font for the CONSOLE. I have the rest of the code done already.
Thanks, <insert my really long username here>

item.title: Setting font color
item.dc:creator: @Cheese_Police c|p
item.description:
@Cheese_Police wrote:

[quote=“pplsuqbawlz, post:3, topic:114008”][quote author=Cheese_Police link=topic=163122.msg1525027#msg1525027 date=1182374767]
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ANSI_escape_code
http://www.javaworld.com/javaworld/javaqa/2002-12/02-qa-1220-console.html
[/quote]
Yick, but yay?[/quote]

It gets the job done

Read full topic
